short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a safeguard against falling for online pranks on or near April Fool's day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Puts a cautionary message at the top of the page on April Fool's Day so you don't feel (and look) like an idiot. Also warns you the day before and after because of all those jerks who live in a different time zone than you.
